channel.title: postgres on Antonio Martinović Blog
channel.description: Recent content in postgres on Antonio Martinović Blog

item.title: Merge Two History tables
item.description: History tables hold the past state of an entity by saving all the values of the original entity along with a date and time range field that specify when these values were valid, I will refer to this field as “validity”. This pattern is used when you need to remember the changes an entity went through over time, it is often used with, for example, pricing data, so that you can track changes of some price as time passes.
